trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that is the destination of the elements copied from <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，它是从 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection" /> 复制的元素的目标。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Array" /> must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 必须具有从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in <c>array</c> at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: <c>array</c> 中从零开始的索引，在此处开始复制。

trans-unit.source: Copies the collection to a compatible one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" />, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: 从目标数组的指定索引处开始，将集合复制到兼容的一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the number of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" /> objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示集合中 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" /> 对象的数目。

trans-unit.source: An integer value representing the number of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" /> objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 表示集合中的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup" /> 对象数目的整数值。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> object in the collection represents an element in the project.
trans-unit.target: 每个<xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup>集合中的对象表示项目中的某个元素。

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator that iterates through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取能够循环访问集合的枚举器。

trans-unit.source: This method allows the caller to use the `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) to iterate through the individual <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> objects in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法允许调用方使用`foreach`C# 语言的语句 (`for each`在 Visual Basic 中) 循环访问单个<xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup>中的对象<xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection" /> is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否同步对 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection" /> 的访问（线程安全）。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if access to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection" /> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果对 <see langword="true" /> 的访问是同步的（线程安全），则为 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取可用于同步对 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection" /> 的访问的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 可用于同步对 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroupCollection" /> 的访问的对象。
